dict.string: Each player's Quarry level is reduced by one.
Each player receives two bricks and two gems. Play an additional card.
Increases your wall by ten. You receive five gems. Your Quarry level is reduced by one.
Increases your wall by one. Play an additional card.
Increases your wall and tower by one each. You receive two recruits.
You receive four gems. Each player's Quarry level increases by one.
Increases your wall by five. You lose six gems.
Increases your wall by three. Increases your wall by an additional three if your wall was at 0 when you played this card.
Increases your Quarry level by one.
Reduces your opponent's Quarry level by one.
Increases your Quarry level by one. Increases your Quarry level by an additional one if your Quarry level was lower than your opponents when you played this card.
Increases your Quarry level to match your opponent's Quarry level. This does not lower your Quarry level if you're Quarry level is higher.
The player or players with the lowest wall take two damage to their tower and their Dungeon levels are reduced by one.
Increases your Quarry level by two.
Increases your wall by four. Increases your Quarry level by one.
Increases your wall by nine. You lose five recruits.
Deals five damage to all walls. Play an additional card.
Increases your Magic level by one. Play an additional card.
Increases your wall by seven. You gain seven gems.
Increases your wall by five. Increases your Dungeon level by one.
Increases your wall by six. You gain six recruits. Increases your Dungeon level by one if your dungeon level is lower than your opponent's Dungeon level.
Increases your wall by six. Increases your tower by three.
Increases your wall by seven. Does six damage to the enemy.
Increases your wall by eight. Increases your tower by five.
Switch your wall with the opponent's wall.
Increases your wall by six. Does ten damage to the enemy.
Increases your wall by twenty. Increases your tower by eight.
Increases your tower by one. Increases your tower by an additional one if it's lower than your opponent's tower when you played this card
Increases each player's tower by one. You receive three gems
Increases your tower by one. Play an additional card
Does three damage to your opponent's tower
Draw one card and then discard one card. Play an additional card
Does one damage to your opponent's tower. Play an additional card
Does five damage to your tower. Increases your Magic level by two
Increases your Magic level by one
Does five damage to your opponent's tower
Increases your tower by seven. You lose ten bricks
Increases your tower by two. Does two damage to your opponent's tower
Increases your tower by four. Does two damage to your opponent's tower. You lose three recruits
Does seven damage to all towers. Each player's Magic level is reduced by one
Increases your tower by eight. This card can't be discarded.
Increases your tower by three. Increases your Magic level by one. Increases your opponent's tower by one
Increases your tower by five. Your opponent loses six bricks
Increases your tower by three. Increases your wall by three. Increases your Magic level by one
Increases the each player's Magic level to that of the highest player's Magic level
Increases your tower by eleven. Reduces your wall by eight
Does nine damage to your opponent's tower. Reduces your Magic level by one
Increases your tower by five. Increases your Magic level by one
Does eight damage. If your tower is greater than your opponent's tower when this card is played, it does eight damage to your opponent's tower instead
Increases your tower by eight. Increases your wall by three
Increases your tower by six. Does four damage to your opponent's tower
Increases your tower by eight. Increases your Dungeon level by one
Increases your tower by ten. Increases your wall by five. You receive five recruits
Increases your tower by twelve. Does six damage to the enemy
Increases your tower by thirteen. You receive six recruits and bricks
Increases each player's Dungeon level by one. You receive three recruits.
Does two damage. Play an additional card.
Does four damage. You lose three gems.
Draw one card and then discard one card. Play an additional card.
Does three damage. You receive one gem.
Does two damage. Does one additional damage if your wall is greater than your opponent's wall when this card is played.
Does six damage. You take three damage.
Increases your Dungeon level by one.
Does eight damage. Does three damage to your tower.
Does three damage to your opponent's tower. You take three damage.
Does four damage. Increases your wall by three.
Does six damage. Each player loses five bricks, gems and recruits.
Does four damage to your opponent's tower.
Does six damage. Your opponent loses three recruits.
Does two damage to your opponent's tower. Play an additional card.
Increases your Dungeon level by two.
Does six damage. Does ten damage instead if opponent's wall was at zero when this card was played.
Does two damage. Increases your wall by four. Increases your tower by two.
Does eight damage. Does twelve damage instead if your Magic level is higher than your opponent's Magic level.
Does six damage. Does six damage to your opponent's tower instead if your wall is greater than your opponent's wall.
Does ten damage. Does seven damage instead if your opponent's wall was at zero when this card was played.
Does eight damage. Reduces your opponent's Quarry level by one.
Reduces your opponent's gems by ten. Reduces your opponent's bricks by five. You gain half of that amount, rounded up.
Does thirteen damage. You lose three gems.
Does five damage to your opponent's tower. Your opponent loses eight recruits.
Does ten damage. Increases your wall by four.
Does ten damage. Your opponent loses five recruits. Reduces your opponent's Dungeon level by one.
Does twelve damage to your opponent's tower.
Does twenty damage. Your opponent loses ten gems. Reduces your opponent's Dungeon level by one.
